title: Chapter 1791 - The Book Of Karma
body:
Chapter 1791 - The Book Of Karma

After Su Yi and Xi Ning left, Jing Cheng’s expression darkened.

He’d come dangerously close to being killed! The thought filled his heart with indescribable lingering terror and murderous intent.

After we’ve left for the ruins of the Dragon Palace, I’ll have you both die unseemly deaths!! Jing Cheng gnashed his teeth, his gaze sinister.

“High Elder, that woman, Xi Ning, is most likely a Divine Daughter from the God Domain!” Jing Hongyu said in a hushed whisper.

Jing Cheng said expressionlessly, “So what if she’s a divine daughter? The divine children might have far-reaching abilities and unimaginable cultivation bases, but they too are subject to the threat of divine misfortune! They can only suppress their cultivation bases. They dare not use their full strength for fear of influencing their path to divinity. They cannot bear the consequences of that!”

A cold grin tugged at his lips. “I anticipated that when word of the ruins of the Dragon Palace spread, it would draw divine children to the auction! I auctioned off that Great Unity Stage treasure, in part to neutralize the divine misfortune afflicting me,...
